item.title: Principales Indicadores Económicos de Chile
item.description: Principales Indicadores Económicos USD UF Cobre USD Line Chart var ctx = document.getElementById('480').getContext('2d'); var options = { type: 'line', data: { labels: ['Lunes 2/8','Martes 3/8', 'Miercoles 4/8', 'Jueves 5/8', 'Viernes 6/8'], datasets: [ { label: 'Dataset 1', data: [760.2, 761.39, 774.54, 775.54, 776.69], borderColor: 'rgba(255, 99, 132, 0.2)', backgroundColor: 'rgba(255, 99, 132, 1)', }, { label: 'Dataset 2', data: Utils.numbers(NUMBER_CFG), borderColor: 'rgba(255, 99, 132, 0.2)', backgroundColor: 'rgba(255, 99, 132, 1)', } ] }, options: { responsive: true, plugins: { legend: { position: 'top', }, title: { display: true, text: 'Valores USD' } } } }; new Chart(ctx, options); USD var ctx = document.
